name: Ikoiki
description:
DESCRIPTION

This is a casual HTML5 game which I licensed to a couple of sites a few years back and hadn't looked at in quite a while. Recently I salvaged it, removed some of the API crap I had to put in and make it run again. 

And I thought why not upload it here to preserve the little game in a place where it can actually by played by people (since I couldn't find it anywhere else anymore).

INSTRUCTIONS

Click/touch left or right from the character to make it move. Click/tap above or below to change gravity direction. Collect all cupcakes to complete a level.
